API reference¶

class packerlabimaging.Experiment(date: str, comments: str, dataPath: str, analysisSavePath: str, microscope: str, expID: str, trialsInformation: MutableMapping[str, packerlabimaging.ExperimentMain.TrialsInformation], useSuite2p: bool = False, s2pResultsPath: Optional[str] = None)[source]¶

A class to initialize and store data of an imaging experiment. This class acts as a bucket to contain information about individual trial objects.

add_trial(trial_id: str, total_frames_stitched: int, trials_information: Optional[packerlabimaging.ExperimentMain.TrialsInformation] = None)[source]¶

Create and add a trial object to the experiment.

trial_id total_frames_stitched trials_information

load_trial(trialID: str)[source]¶

method for importing individual trial objects from Experiment instance using the trial id for a given trial

property pkl_path¶

s2pResultsPath in Analysis folder to save pkl object

save_pkl(pkl_path: Optional[str] = None)[source]¶

saves packerlabimaging Experiment object using Pickle library (.pkl file extension).

Parameters

pkl_path – full .pkl s2pResultsPath for saving the Experiment object.

property tiff_path_dir¶

retrieve the parent directory of the provided tiff_path

update_suite2p(trialID: Optional[str] = None, s2pResultsPath: Optional[str] = None)[source]¶

trialID s2pResultsPath

object

class packerlabimaging.TwoPhotonImagingTrial(metainfo: dict, analysis_save_path: str, microscope: str = 'Bruker', paqOptions: Optional[dict] = None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Just two photon imaging related functions - currently set up for data collected from Bruker microscopes and suite2p processed Ca2+ imaging data

create_anndata()[source]¶

Creates annotated data (see anndata library for more information on AnnotatedData) object based around the Ca2+ matrix of the imaging trial.

property date¶

date of the experiment datacollection

meanRawFluTrace()[source]¶

Collects the raw mean of FOV fluorescence trace across the t-series.

Parameters

  • plot – (optional) plot mean fluorescence trace

  • save – (optional) save data object after collecting mean fluorescence trace

Returns

mean fluorescence trace

TODO returns a dictionary of all paths associated with trial

property pkl_path¶

s2pResultsPath in Analysis folder to save pkl object

plotSingleImageFrame(frame_num: int = 0, title: Optional[str] = None)[source]¶

plots an image of a single specified tiff frame after reading using tifffile. :param frame_num: frame # from 2p imaging tiff to show (default is 0 - i.e. the first frame) :param title: (optional) give a string to use as title :return: matplotlib imshow plot
